messages.title: NHS no safe with Lib Dems and Tories
messages.content: Scored worst ratings for GP access in Leeds.

messages.title: Builds in Crisis
messages.content: Council housing sold off and not replaced, crisis of affordability and availability.

messages.title: Time to Stop Cuts - Time to Grow
messages.content: Our area loses out on funding, needs investment in services and development.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protection and investment in local NHS services.
Building affordable homes, stopping sale of council housing.
Investing in local services and development.

issues.health: NHS in crisis under current government, Labour promises protection and investment in local services.

housing.content: Council housing sold off and not replaced leading to a crisis of affordability and availability

leaflet.personalStatement: Vote Neil Walshaw for local Headingley & Hyde Park Labour Party Candidate, A Fair society where everyone can succeed.

politicalExperience.achievements: Led the council to build more council housing than for years and worked hard to deliver service.

quotes.text: I am delighted that Neil is standing for election in Headingley & Hyde Park and proud to support him.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Clear choice at this election, a Labour vote for fairness or more Tory-Lib Dem cuts.
